Description: Wooden male figure wearing a short wig and kilt and holding a staff; painted detail(worn on the body); rectangular plinth(originally black).
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 237)
